verses.verse: Moreover <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> "Let me now <S%H977>choose<s%> <S%H8147>twelve<s%> <S%H505>thousand<s%> <S%H376>men,<s%> and I will <S%H6965>arise<s%> and <S%H7291>pursue<s%> <S%H310>after<s%> <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H3915>tonight.<s%>

I will <S%H935>come<s%> on him while he is <S%H3023>weary<s%> and <S%H7504>exhausted,<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and will make him <S%H2729>afraid.<s%> All the <S%H5971>people<s%> who are with him shall <S%H5127>flee.<s%> I will <S%H5221>strike<s%> the king <S%H4428>only;<s%>

and I will bring <S%H7725>back<s%> all the <S%H5971>people<s%> to <S%H376>you.<s%> The man whom you <S%H1245>seek<s%> is as if all <S%H7725>returned.<s%> All the <S%H5971>people<s%> shall be in <S%H7965>peace.<s%>"
The <S%H1697>saying<s%> <S%H3474>pleased<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H5869>well,<s%> and all the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
Then <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "Now <S%H7121>call<s%> <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%> <S%H8085>also,<s%> and let us hear likewise what he <S%H6310>says.<s%>"

When <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H559>him,<s%> saying, <S%H302>"Ahithophel<s%> has <S%H1696>spoken<s%> like <S%H1697>this.<s%> Shall we <S%H6213>do<s%> what he <S%H1697>says?<s%> If <S%H1696>not,<s%> speak up."
<S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H53>Absalom,<s%> "The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> that <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> has <S%H3289>given<s%> this <S%H6471>time<s%> is not <S%H2896>good.<s%>"

<S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> <S%H3045>moreover,<s%> "You know your <S%H1>father<s%> and his <S%H582>men,<s%> that they are mighty <S%H1368>men,<s%> and they are <S%H4751>fierce<s%> in their <S%H5315>minds,<s%> like a <S%H1677>bear<s%> <S%H7909>robbed<s%> of her cubs in the <S%H7704>field.<s%> Your <S%H1>father<s%> is a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> and will not <S%H3885>lodge<s%> with the <S%H5971>people.<s%>

<S%H2244>Behold,<s%> he is now hidden in <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H6354>pit,<s%> or in <S%H259>some<s%> other <S%H4725>place.<s%> It will <S%H5307>happen,<s%> when some of them have fallen at the <S%H8462>first,<s%> that <S%H8085>whoever<s%> <S%H8085>hears<s%> it will <S%H559>say,<s%> <S%H4046><s%> 'There is a slaughter among the <S%H5971>people<s%> who <S%H310>follow<s%> <S%H53>Absalom!<s%>'

Even he who is <S%H1121>valiant,<s%> whose <S%H3820>heart<s%> is as the <S%H3820>heart<s%> of a <S%H738>lion,<s%> will <S%H4549>utterly<s%> <S%H4549>melt;<s%> for all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H3045>knows<s%> that your <S%H1>father<s%> is a mighty <S%H1368>man,<s%> and those who are with him are <S%H2428>valiant<s%> <S%H1121>men.<s%>

But I <S%H3289>counsel<s%> that all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> be <S%H622>gathered<s%> <S%H622>together<s%> to <S%H1835>you,<s%> from Dan even to <S%H884>Beersheba,<s%> as the <S%H2344>sand<s%> that is by the <S%H3220>sea<s%> for <S%H7230>multitude;<s%> and that you <S%H1980>go<s%> to <S%H7128>battle<s%> in your own <S%H6440>person.<s%>

So shall we <S%H935>come<s%> on him in <S%H259>some<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> where he shall be <S%H4672>found,<s%> and we will <S%H5168>light<s%> on him as the <S%H2919>dew<s%> <S%H5307>falls<s%> on the <S%H127>ground;<s%> and of him and of all the <S%H582>men<s%> who are with him we will not <S%H3498>leave<s%> so much <S%H1571>as<s%> <S%H259>one.<s%>

<S%H518>Moreover,<s%> if he be <S%H622>gone<s%> into a <S%H5892>city,<s%> then shall all <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5375>bring<s%> <S%H2256>ropes<s%> to that <S%H5892>city,<s%> and we will <S%H5498>draw<s%> it into the <S%H5158>river,<s%> until there <S%H1571>isn't<s%> one small <S%H6872>stone<s%> found <S%H4672>there.<s%>"

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> the <S%H757>Archite<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> than the <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel.<s%>" For <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> had <S%H6680>ordained<s%> to <S%H6565>defeat<s%> the <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H6098>counsel<s%> of <S%H302>Ahithophel,<s%> to the <S%H5668>intent<s%> that <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> might <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> on <S%H53>Absalom.<s%>

Then <S%H2365>Hushai<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H6659>Zadok<s%> and to <S%H54>Abiathar<s%> the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> <S%H302>"Ahithophel<s%> <S%H3289>counseled<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> and the <S%H2205>elders<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> that <S%H3289>way;<s%> and I have counseled this way.

Now therefore <S%H7971>send<s%> <S%H4120>quickly,<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3885><s%> 'Don't lodge this <S%H3915>night<s%> at the <S%H6160>fords<s%> of the <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> but by all <S%H5674>means<s%> pass <S%H5674>over;<s%> lest the <S%H4428>king<s%> be swallowed <S%H1104>up,<s%> and all the people who are with <S%H5971>him.<s%>'"

Now <S%H3083>Jonathan<s%> and <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> were <S%H5975>staying<s%> by En <S%H5883>Rogel;<s%> and a female <S%H8198>servant<s%> used to <S%H1980>go<s%> and <S%H5046>tell<s%> <S%H1980>them;<s%> and they went and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David.<s%> For they <S%H3201>might<s%> not be <S%H7200>seen<s%> to <S%H935>come<s%> into the <S%H5892>city.<s%>

But a <S%H5288>boy<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> <S%H5046>them,<s%> and told <S%H53>Absalom.<s%> Then they <S%H8147>both<s%> <S%H3212>went<s%> away <S%H4120>quickly,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of a <S%H376>man<s%> in <S%H980>Bahurim,<s%> who had a <S%H875>well<s%> in his <S%H2691>court;<s%> and they went <S%H3381>down<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> and <S%H6566>spread<s%> the <S%H4539>covering<s%> over the <S%H875>well<s%>'s <S%H6440>mouth,<s%> and <S%H7849>spread<s%> out bruised <S%H7383>grain<s%> on <S%H1697>it;<s%> and nothing was <S%H3045>known.<s%>

<S%H53>Absalom<s%>'s <S%H5650>servants<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to the <S%H802>woman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house;<s%> and they <S%H559>said,<s%> "Where are <S%H290>Ahimaaz<s%> and <S%H3083>Jonathan?<s%>" The <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H5674>them,<s%> "They have gone over the <S%H4323>brook<s%> of <S%H4325>water.<s%>" When they had <S%H1245>sought<s%> and could not <S%H4672>find<s%> <S%H7725>them,<s%> they returned to <S%H3389>Jerusalem.<s%>

It <S%H310>happened,<s%> after they had <S%H3212>departed,<s%> that they came <S%H5927>up<s%> <S%H3212>out<s%> of the <S%H875>well,<s%> and <S%H3212>went<s%> and <S%H5046>told<s%> <S%H4428>king<s%> <S%H1732>David;<s%> and they <S%H5046>said<s%> to <S%H1732>David,<s%> <S%H6965>"Arise<s%> and pass <S%H4120>quickly<s%> <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H4325>water;<s%> for thus has Ahithophel counseled against <S%H302>you.<s%>"

Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and all the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H5674>him,<s%> and they passed over the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%> By the <S%H1242>morning<s%> <S%H216>light<s%> there <S%H5737>lacked<s%> not <S%H259>one<s%> of them who had not gone <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan.<s%>

When <S%H302>Ahithophel<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that his <S%H6098>counsel<s%> was not <S%H6213>followed,<s%> he <S%H2280>saddled<s%> his <S%H2543>donkey,<s%> and <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3212>home,<s%> to <S%H1004>his<s%> <S%H5892>city,<s%> and set his <S%H3212>house<s%> in <S%H6680>order,<s%> and <S%H2614>hanged<s%> <S%H4191>himself;<s%> and he died, and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> in the <S%H6913>tomb<s%> of his <S%H1>father.<s%>
Then <S%H1732>David<s%> <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H4266>Mahanaim.<s%> <S%H53>Absalom<s%> passed <S%H5674>over<s%> the <S%H3383>Jordan,<s%> he and all the <S%H376>men<s%> of Israel with <S%H3478>him.<s%>

<S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H7760>set<s%> <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> over the <S%H6635>army<s%> instead of <S%H3097>Joab.<s%> Now <S%H6021>Amasa<s%> was the <S%H1121>son<s%> of a <S%H376>man,<s%> whose <S%H8034>name<s%> was <S%H3501>Ithra<s%> the <S%H3481>Israelite,<s%> who went <S%H935>in<s%> to <S%H26>Abigail<s%> the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H5176>Nahash,<s%> <S%H269>sister<s%> to <S%H6870>Zeruiah,<s%> <S%H3097>Joab<s%>'s <S%H517>mother.<s%>
<S%H3478>Israel<s%> and <S%H53>Absalom<s%> <S%H2583>encamped<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

It <S%H1732>happened,<s%> when David had <S%H935>come<s%> to <S%H4266>Mahanaim,<s%> that <S%H7629>Shobi<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5176>Nahash<s%> of <S%H7237>Rabbah<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H5983>Ammon,<s%> and <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5988>Ammiel<s%> of <S%H3810>Lodebar,<s%> and <S%H1271>Barzillai<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite<s%> of <S%H7274>Rogelim,<s%>

<S%H5066>brought<s%> <S%H4904>beds,<s%> <S%H5592>basins,<s%> <S%H3335>earthen<s%> <S%H3627>vessels,<s%> <S%H2406>wheat,<s%> <S%H8184>barley,<s%> <S%H7058>meal,<s%> <S%H7039>parched<s%> <S%H6321>grain,<s%> beans, <S%H5742>lentils,<s%> roasted <S%H7039>grain,<s%>

<S%H1706>honey,<s%> <S%H2529>butter,<s%> <S%H6629>sheep,<s%> and <S%H8194>cheese<s%> of the <S%H1241>herd,<s%> for <S%H1732>David,<s%> and for the <S%H5971>people<s%> who were with <S%H398>him,<s%> to eat: for they <S%H559>said,<s%> "The <S%H5971>people<s%> are <S%H7457>hungry,<s%> and <S%H5889>weary,<s%> and <S%H6771>thirsty,<s%> in the <S%H4057>wilderness.<s%>"
